metadata.description: Custom skills for Claude Code - Gemini/KINTONE integration

plugins.name: gemini-skill
plugins.description: Gemini CLI integration for Claude Code. Enables large file analysis (1M tokens), web search, OCR, UI/UX design, and code review as second opinion.

plugins.name: kintone-skill
plugins.description: KINTONE REST API integration for Claude Code. CRUD operations, search with natural language query, schema caching, and file attachments.
